meaningMnemonic: <radical>Every</radical> <radical>winter</radical> you are <kanji>alert</kanji> for danger. Everyone knows that the worst monsters come out in the winter so you need to be alert if you want to survive.
readingMnemonic: Being the <kanji>alert</kanji> fellow you are, you hear a sasquatch approaching and dive into a trash <reading>bin</reading> (びん) to hide. The bin smells really bad and you are keenly alert to all the various stenches and smells currently penetrating your nostrils, but at least you are safe.
